item.title: Quantum State in a Nutshell
item.description: There are thousands of articles trying to explain what exactly a quantum state is. Many of them boiled down to ‘‘the state of a qubit is 0, 1, or 0 and 1 at the same time’’. This statement leads to both confusion and misinterpretation. The explanation I found on Quantum computing for the very curious is by far the most elegant and simplest: The state of a qubit is a vector in a two-dimensional vector space.
